subject: Personal Finance
title: Opportunity Cost
description: Learn Opportunity Cost in one minute.

hook.text: You chose college over a $40K job. The degree didn't just cost tuition â€” it cost four years of income too.

buildup.text: Opportunity cost is the value of the next best thing you gave up when making a choice.

discovery.text: Every decision has a hidden cost: the path not taken. Free events still cost time you could spend elsewhere.

twist.text: Companies use opportunity cost constantly. Every dollar spent on marketing is a dollar not spent on R&D.

climax.text: Thinking in opportunity costs makes you a better decision-maker because you consider full trade-offs.

punchline.text: Every yes is a no to something else.

quiz.question: What is opportunity cost?
options: The value of the next best alternative you gave up
The cost of a missed opportunity to invest
